text: Inse kaho ke “lao apne woh gawah jo is baat ki shahadat dein ke Allah hi ne in cheezon ko haraam kiya hai”. Phir agar woh shahadat de dein to tum unke saath shahadat na dena, aur hargiz un logon ki khwahishat ke pichey na chalna jinhon ne hamari aayat ko jhutlaya hai, aur jo aakhirat ke munkir hain, aur jo dusron ko apne Rubb ka humsar banate hain
